Task_Completion.description: Whether the task was successfully completed or not

Actions_Count.description: Total number of actions performed during the task

Valid_Actions.description: The proportion of valid actions performed during the task

Target_Identification.description: Accuracy of identifying essential objects related to the task

THOUGHT_Efficiency.description: Clear thinking and planning of actions before performing them

Environment_Interaction.description: How well the agent interacts with the environment based on feedback
